articles.title: Covid-19 cases are falling, but are we past the peak? - CNN
articles.description: Covid-19 cases continued to decline over the last four weeks, with the seven-day average down nearly 20% from the week before, meaning we may have passed the peak in the winter surge. But don't let the positive sound of that trend fool you.

articles.title: Lyft stock rises more than 10% after company reports signs of pandemic recovery - CNBC
articles.description: Lyft reported fourth-quarter losses of $458.2 million for the fourth quarter of 2020.
articles.content:
Ride-hailing company Lyft reported fourth-quarter earnings on Tuesday, surpassing Wall Street's top- and bottom-line expectations but disappointing when it came to active riders.

articles.author: Leslie Josephs
articles.title: Boeing delivers 26 planes in January as cancellations continue to outpace new sales - CNBC
articles.description: Boeing delivered 26 planes in January and its backlog shrunk as cancellations outpaced new orders.
articles.content:
Boeing said Tuesday that it delivered 26 planes to customers last month but order cancellations continued to outpace new sales as the manufacturer is still struggling in the Covid-19 pandemic.
